task.title: Configuring users
task.shortdesc: System Administrators can create appliance users by using the GUI or the CLI.

taskbody.context:
You can chouse from the following roles when creating users:
System Administrators These users have the most access. TBD
Messaging Administrators TBD
Users TBD

step.cmd: Go to the Users page by either of the following steps:

choices.choice: On the Home tab, click Appliance Users in the Create users and groups box.
On the Appliance tab, click Users.

step.cmd: To add, delete, or edit appliance, use the icons in the Web UI Users box.
step.info:
You can:
Add a user by clicking the Add icon.
Delete a user by selecting the user and then clicking the Delete icon.
Edit a user by selecting the user and then clicking the Edit icon. There is no limit to the amount of DNS addresses that you can add.
